about_the_game:
Hop on board the ultimate train defense challenge! Build, upgrade, and strategize as endless waves of enemies threaten your precious Infinite Power Generator.

All Aboard! The Train Defense Express blends the best elements of auto-battlers, survivors, tower defense, and idle/clicker mechanics into a unique strategy experience. It’s easy to pick up, but hard to put down—don’t let its casual appearance fool you!

Your job is to protect the Infinite Power Generator by buying defensive train carriages to destroy incoming enemies, and economic train carriages to help generate gold. Choose carefully—only the right combination of carriages will allow you to survive the endless waves of enemies!

Level up your carriages by combining 3 of the same type and level to create even more powerful defenses! You can level up carriages infinitely, but it'll cost you.

It's essential to buy upgrades from the shop! Upgrade the value of gems so that each gem is worth more gold, and hire miners to automatically produce more gems for you.

Survive against the orc onslaught!
detailed_description:
Hop on board the ultimate train defense challenge! Build, upgrade, and strategize as endless waves of enemies threaten your precious Infinite Power Generator.

All Aboard! The Train Defense Express blends the best elements of auto-battlers, survivors, tower defense, and idle/clicker mechanics into a unique strategy experience. It’s easy to pick up, but hard to put down—don’t let its casual appearance fool you!

Your job is to protect the Infinite Power Generator by buying defensive train carriages to destroy incoming enemies, and economic train carriages to help generate gold. Choose carefully—only the right combination of carriages will allow you to survive the endless waves of enemies!

Level up your carriages by combining 3 of the same type and level to create even more powerful defenses! You can level up carriages infinitely, but it'll cost you.

It's essential to buy upgrades from the shop! Upgrade the value of gems so that each gem is worth more gold, and hire miners to automatically produce more gems for you.

Survive against the orc onslaught!
legal_notice:
Steam promotional material (trailers, capsule art, etc.) licenses art from:
  • Kooky - Pixel Train - the train and carriages pictures in the promotional art - CC BY 4.0
  • bdragon1727 - Cannon Gun - the cannon in the promotional art - donation required for commercial use (already paid)
  • Ozzed - 8-Bit Empire - Song "I Like Jump Rope" edited for length and used in trailer - CC BY-SA
  • More assets are used in the creation of the game itself -- please see in-game Credits menu.
name: All Aboard! The Train Defense Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (e.g., Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with OpenGL 3.3 support (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Supports keyboard-only, mouse-only, controller-only, or any mix of these inputs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU (e.g., Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Ryzen 5)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU with OpenGL 3.3 support (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 7850)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Protect the Infinite Power Generator by looping around the train tracks! Battle endless waves of enemies in this unique hybrid of auto-battler, survivor, tower defense, idle/clicker gameplay. How long can you survive?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
